CustomField.description: This field detects if the opportunity is ready to be audited.
CustomField.formula:
AND( ispickval(StageName,"Closed/Won"), CPE_NRC__c > 2500, ispickval(Mrg_Approved__c, "Closed (Ink)"), Net_New_MRR__c = 0, ispickval(Audit_Results__c, ""),
OR( MONTH(TODAY()) > 2 && DAY(TODAY()) <= 14 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = 2 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 0, MONTH(TODAY()) > 2 && DAY(TODAY()) >= 15 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = 1 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 0, MONTH(TODAY()) = 2 && DAY(TODAY()) <= 14 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = -11 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 0, MONTH(TODAY()) = 2 && DAY(TODAY()) >= 15 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = 1 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 0, MONTH(TODAY()) = 1 && DAY(TODAY()) <= 14 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = -10 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 1, MONTH(TODAY()) = 1 && DAY(TODAY()) >= 15 && MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(CloseDate) = -11 && YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(CloseDate) = 1 ))
CustomField.label: Ready for Sales Audit
